title: Apple Earbuds, iPhone Wired with Lightning Connector [Apple MFi Certified] Wired Earphones with Microphone Volume Control Music and Calling Headphones for iPhone 14/13/12/11/SE/X/XR/XS/8/7-2 Pack
description: Built-in microphone allows hands-free communication in driving. The earbuds is convenient remote control for music play and phone calls. 2-pack headphones are ideal backup or share with family, friends or lover.
Noise isolating material realizes natural sound quality with low distortion, the earphones reduces external noise and minimizes the interference.
Ergonomically designed to fit the outline of the ear, the headphones is lightweight and fits your ear snugly and securely.
Built-in microphone and buttons realize hands-free operation, you don’t have to hold the cell phone all the time when you answer the calls or skip the music.
